We are [experienced AI Engineers](team.qmd) who have built AI products at leading tech companies.

# Services

## Education

We offer workshops on LLM performance issues, evals, and fine-tuning. Currently, we are teaching a course on how to [Conistently Improve Any AI Application With Evals](https://maven.com/parlance-labs/evals).

## Strategy

We will advise you on:

-   LLM performance issues: (cost, quality, speed)
-   Evals, RAG, fine-tuning, and prompt engineering
-   Vendor selection and integration
-   AI product development and engineering

We will provide your team with ongoing guidance through regular meetings and contiouous async access.

## Customized Services

Can't find what you need? We can customize our services to your needs.  Some examples include:

- Evaluating AI tools and platforms.  We will carefully review your docs, upload real data (with permission) to your product, and provide detailed feedback.
- Debugging specific issues with your AI application.

# Pricing

Our minimum level of engagement starts at **$34,500**.  We customize our pricing based on expected outcomes.  If this is out of your budget, see our [education](#education) options.

**[Fill out this form](https://form.typeform.com/to/M8f89mlM) to book a meeting with us to get started.**  You can also contact us at `consulting@parlance-labs.com` with any questions.
